metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2158 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the pngcrush_measure_idat function in pngcrush.c in pngcrush before 1.7.84 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted PNG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2158` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pngcrush - 1.7.84-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pngcrush package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.84-1').
